name: No Time (Erathor_Noname)
description:
DISCLAIMER: The file is an older Tech Demo. The first alpha version will be released some time around February.

After you stole a time machine from a secret facility you go on a trip through time. Visit all possible time periods with specific jobs and quests for each of them. But watch out for the Time Agents.  And avoid yourself when traveling in time! #action #simulation #rpg #scifi #adventure #survival #other

Join our Discord for the newest info on this game and also to vote on the price tag!

https://discord.gg/EG2wkT7

Keyboard:

W,A,S,D - Movement F - Use I - Inventory 1-4 - Inventory Hotkeys Q - Questlog E - Take/Drop

Car:

W,S Speed A,D Turn left/right Space Brakes

Hovercar: G toggle hovermode W,S Speed A,D Turn left/right LShift + A,D Roll LShift Rotate Car towards your view

How to travel thru time: -Recharge your reactor in the back of the car by putting in uranium batteries (which can be found in the front luggage space of the car) -Hop into the car and activate the Time Conduction and then use the terminal to set the destination. -Then you put in the numbers of the date in this order monthdayyearhourminute... then confirm with enter and have fun traveling :)
